## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                             | Type                             | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | -------- |
| `type`   | `type`    | Determines the style of the message box | `"error" \| "info" \| "warning"` | `'info'` |
